parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
Supported language. Valid values:
- zh-CN: Chinese
- en-US: English

parameters.name: DynamicSql
parameters.description: Specifies whether the SQL statement is dynamic.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of querying the SQL execution plan.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: PlanUnionHash
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the execution plan.

parameters.name: ReturnBriefInfo
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return an overview of the execution plan.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of querying the SQL execution plan.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
